title: Atomic Bakery
text: You haven't had a good loaf of bread in a long time. The World Baking Industry has an idea of using its spare money to change that. After combining some strange government subsidies, the creation of Atomic Bakery can begin, did I tell you about subsidies? As with all atomic constructions, any bug can be lethal. Pay attention to them.

title: Most delicious bread
text: ${E1}.name argues with ${E2}.name about which bread is the most delicious. ${E1}.name says baguettes, while ${E2}.name says pretzels. Who is right?

title: Men in Black
text: At the meeting with the client, two men in black showed up. They handed you a briefcase and one of them said: "You need to get this done. The future depends on it. Do we understand each other? And I hope you know what confidential means?'
